thread.title: Colleen
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Colleen

author: Colleen
title: Colleen
text: We enjoy jigsaw puzzles. All colors, all pictures, all shapes. White Mountain Puzzles are consistently great puzzles. While challenging, they are also fun to put together. The colors are bright and vivid; the images well thought out. The pieces are large enough to make it easy for either arthritic or young hands to put them together. I would recommend White Mountain Puzzles to anyone who loves puzzles.
